title: Show uploaded QR code image on the Slides tab

requirements.text: Add the uploaded image file "Morris, 2012, QR code.png" to the frontend static assets (under the existing public assets path convention, e.g., frontend/public/assets/...) and render it on the Slides page (/slides).

quotes: add this picture to slides tab

acceptanceCriteria: The repository contains the uploaded file "Morris, 2012, QR code.png" under a public static assets directory so it is served by the frontend.
Visiting the Slides tab route (/slides) displays the image.
The image is responsive (fits within the page width without overflowing) and includes an English alt text.
The Slides tab no longer renders a blank page (SlidesPage.tsx no longer returns null).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not implement slide decks, multi-slide navigation, uploads, or backend storage for slides.
Do not change routing/navigation structure beyond what is required to display the image on the existing /slides route.
